directions.step:
grated the raw potatoes in a food proccessor or use the small holes on a cheese grader.
combine the potatoes, flour*, egg and salt.
*for the flour, use as much needed to make a pancake-type batter
in a frying pan put in about an inch of oil and heat until when a drop of batter sizzles.
than drop about 2 Tbs of batter in the oil, smoothing out to make a pancake. and fry on both sides until cooked throught out, but not too browned. the balenies have to be cooked but soft.
serve with sour cream!!! Posted to TNT - Prodigy's Recipe Exchange Newsletter by Pete or Julie Caler <petec@cy-net.net> on Jul 07, 1997
